Ability.Tooltip:
Left-Click to show ability checks and saving throws.
Right-click to roll Initiative (ALT: Adv / CTRL: Disadv).

EnableUI.Name: Enable BG3 Hotbar UI
EnableUI.Hint: Enable or disable the BG3-style hotbar interface. Disable this if you prefer to use a different hotbar module or the default Foundry hotbar.

ShowDamageRanges.Name: Show Damage as Ranges
ShowDamageRanges.Hint: Display spell damage as min-max ranges instead of dice notation (e.g., '1-8 fire' instead of '1d8 fire')

ShowMaterialDescription.Name: Show Material Components Description
ShowMaterialDescription.Hint: Display the full description of material components in spell tooltips (e.g. 'diamonds worth 300gp, which the spell consumes')

EnableLightTooltip.Name: Configure Tooltip display
EnableLightTooltip.Hint: Choose what should be displayed in item tooltip

BypassSpellPreparationCheck.Name: Include Unprepared Spells
BypassSpellPreparationCheck.Hint: When enabled, all spells will be included in the hotbar regardless of their preparation state

EnforceSpellPreparationPC.Name: Enforce Spell Preparation (Linked Tokens)
EnforceSpellPreparationPC.Hint: When enabled, linked tokens (including player characters) will only show prepared spells and special spells (innate, at-will, pact, ritual, always). When disabled, all spells will appear.

EnforceSpellPreparationNPC.Name: Enforce Spell Preparation (Unlinked Tokens)
EnforceSpellPreparationNPC.Hint: When enabled, unlinked tokens will only show prepared spells and special spells (innate, at-will, pact, ritual, always). When disabled, all spells will appear.

CollapseFoundryMacrobar.Name: Collapse Foundry Macrobar
CollapseFoundryMacrobar.Hint: Automatically collapse the default Foundry macrobar. On Foundry V13 or higher, "Always" and "Fully Hidden" do the same thing.

ShowPassiveFeaturesContainer.Name: Show Passive Features Container
ShowPassiveFeaturesContainer.Hint: Display the container of passive features above the portrait

TooltipDelay.Name: Tooltip Delay
TooltipDelay.Hint: How long to wait before showing tooltips (in milliseconds)

FadeOutDelay.Name: Fade Out Delay
FadeOutDelay.Hint: Seconds to wait before fading out the hotbar

NormalOpacity.Name: Normal Opacity
NormalOpacity.Hint: Opacity of the hotbar when mouse is over it (0.1 to 1.0)

FadedOpacity.Name: Faded Opacity
FadedOpacity.Hint: Opacity of the hotbar when mouse is not over it (0.0 to 1.0). Set to 1 to disable fading completely.

AutoPopulateUnlinkedTokens.Name: Auto-Populate Unlinked Tokens
AutoPopulateUnlinkedTokens.Hint: Automatically populate the hotbar for newly created unlinked tokens based on the settings below

Container1AutoPopulate.Name: Container 1 Auto-Populate
Container1AutoPopulate.Hint: What item types to automatically populate in the first container (index 0)

Container2AutoPopulate.Name: Container 2 Auto-Populate
Container2AutoPopulate.Hint: What item types to automatically populate in the second container (index 1)

Container3AutoPopulate.Name: Container 3 Auto-Populate
Container3AutoPopulate.Hint: What item types to automatically populate in the third container (index 2)

AutoPopulateOverflow.Name: When Container is Full
AutoPopulateOverflow.Hint: Choose how to handle items when the container runs out of space.

AutoPopulateFillDirection.Name: Auto-Populate Fill Direction
AutoPopulateFillDirection.Hint: Whether to fill rows first (left to right, then down) or columns first (top to bottom, then right)
AutoPopulateFillDirection.RowFirst: Rows First (Left to Right, Then Down)
AutoPopulateFillDirection.ColumnFirst: Columns First (Top to Bottom, Then Right)

ContainerAutoPopulate.Name: Select Item Types
ContainerAutoPopulate.Hint: Choose which types of items to automatically add to this container.

HighlightStyle.Name: Highlight Style
HighlightStyle.Hint: Choose how items are highlighted when filtered

DefaultPortraitPreferences.Name: Default Portrait Display
DefaultPortraitPreferences.Hint: Choose whether to display token images or character portraits by default. This can be overridden per token. For the first time you enable this setting, it will apply to all tokens that do not have a portrait set.

ShowRestTurnButton.Name: Show Rest/Turn buttons
ShowRestTurnButton.Hint: Control which rest and turn buttons are displayed in the hotbar

EnableTargetSelector.Name: Enable Target Selector
EnableTargetSelector.Hint: Show an interactive target selector for spells and abilities that require targeting. When enabled, clicking items that need targets will show a crosshair cursor and allow you to select targets on the canvas.

ShowRangeIndicators.Name: Show Range Indicators
ShowRangeIndicators.Hint: Display visual range indicators when using the target selector. Shows circles around your token indicating the maximum range of spells and abilities.

RangeIndicatorShape.Name: Range Indicator Shape
RangeIndicatorShape.Hint: Choose the shape of range indicators. Circle shows traditional round range, while Square shows grid-based D&D 5e range that better matches token movement.

RangeIndicatorAnimation.Name: Range Indicator Animation
RangeIndicatorAnimation.Hint: Choose whether range indicators should pulse to draw attention or remain static. Pulse makes them more noticeable, while static provides a cleaner appearance.

RangeIndicatorLineWidth.Name: Range Indicator Line Width
RangeIndicatorLineWidth.Hint: Choose the thickness of range indicator lines. Thicker lines are more visible but may be more intrusive.

RangeIndicatorColor.Name: Range Indicator Color
RangeIndicatorColor.Hint: Choose the color of range indicators. The indicator will show as an outline in this color with no fill.

AutoTargetSelf.Name: Auto-Target Self
AutoTargetSelf.Hint: Automatically target yourself for spells and abilities that can only target the caster (like self-buffs). When enabled, self-targeting spells will skip the target selector.

SkipSelectorWithValidTarget.Name: Skip Selector with Valid Target
SkipSelectorWithValidTarget.Hint: For single-target spells/abilities, skip the target selector if a valid target is already selected.

EnableRangeChecking.Name: Enable Range Checking
EnableRangeChecking.Hint: Check if targets are within range when using the target selector. When disabled, you can target any token regardless of spell/ability range.

OverlayModePortrait.Name: Health Overlay as Mask
OverlayModePortrait.Hint: If checked, Health Overlay won't cover transparent part of Character Portrait. Check it if you're using Dynamic Token Ring.

MenuTheme.Name: Theme configuration
MenuTheme.Hint: Choose between available themes or create a custom one.
MenuTheme.Label: Configure Theme

scopeTheme.Name: Theme Scope
scopeTheme.Hint: If checked every player will be able to choose his own theme. Otherwise the theme selected by the GM will be the same for everyone.

PlayerListVisibility.Name: Player List Visibility
PlayerListVisibility.Hint: Control the visibility of the default Foundry player list in the bottom-left.

ShowDeathSavingThrow.Name: Display Death Saving Throw
ShowDeathSavingThrow.Hint: Control how the Death Saving Throw should be displayed.

Choices.only: Only display a clickable skull on portrait

EnableHPControls.Name: Enable HP controls
EnableHPControls.Hint: Add extra controls on HP when hovering portrait.

BR.Name: Bonus & Reaction active effects
BR.Hint: Set Bonus Action and Reaction as used based on MidiQoL active effects.

ADV.Name: Add Advantage/Disadvantage buttons
ADV.Hint: Add an advantage or disadvantage source. Need MidiQoL fast forward to be enable.

GamePause.Name: Keep "Game Paused" on top
GamePause.Hint: If checked UI will be displayed under the "Game Paused" label.

AutoScale.Name: Auto UI scale
AutoScale.Hint: Auto scale the UI based on your browser. Disable the UI scale parameter below.

EnableGMHotbar.Name: Enable GM Hotbar
EnableGMHotbar.Hint: Show GM special hotbar when no or multiple tokens are selected.

EnableWeaponAutoEquip.Name: Enable Weapon Sets Auto-Equip
EnableWeaponAutoEquip.Hint: If checked, selecting a token or switching between weapon sets will automatically equip or unequip items.

NpcUseContainerDefaults.Name: NPCs Use Container Defaults
NpcUseContainerDefaults.Hint: If checked, NPCs (linked or unlinked) will ignore weapon sets and use container auto-populate defaults instead.

HoverFilterShow.Name: Hotbar Filter on hover
HoverFilterShow.Hint: If checked, show Hotbar Filter only when hovering it.

ShowExtendedFilter.Name: Show Extended Filters
ShowExtendedFilter.Hint: If checked, show items with limited uses as Filter (no highlight/grey out).

Global.Name: General settings
Global.Hint: Native Foundry elements or general BG3 UI settings.
Global.Label: Configure General

Theme.Name: Theme settings
Theme.Hint: Choose between available themes or create a custom one.
Theme.Label: Configure Theme

TargetSelector.Name: Target Selector settings
TargetSelector.Hint: Settings for the interactive target selector system.
TargetSelector.Label: Configure Target Selector

Midi.Name: Synchro MidiQoL setting
Midi.Hint: Synchonization with MidiQoL features. Must have MidiQoL module installed.
Midi.Label: Configure Synchro MidiQoL

CPR.Name: Choose CPR Actions
CPR.Hint: Select which CPR actions to auto-populate in common actions container.
CPR.Label: Select CPR Actions
CPR.UpTo6: Select which CPR actions to auto-populate in common actions container. Up to 6.
